long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If you are a fan of Sudoku, you'll go crazy over this new logic game!

INTRODUCTION
Play Classic Nonogram on your Google Chrome Browser with our simple & lightweight extension - No Internet required, no ADS, and 100% Free!

HOW TO INSTALL?
1. Click "Add to Chrome" to install the extension
2. Pin the Classic Nonogram extension icon to the Chrome toolbar
3. Click the Classic Nonogram icon on the Chrome toolbar, the Classic Nonogram popup will open. 
That's all you need to do! Have fun!

HOW TO PLAY?
The aim of the game is to work out which cells must be colored or left blank. The numbers on columns and rows will help you - but be careful! You only have three lives!

12 different difficulties with 24 levels each
